modalLogic.formula

Class Literal<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • modalLogic.formula.Formula<T>
      • modalLogic.formula.FormulaImpl<T>
        • modalLogic.formula.Literal<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Formula<T>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Constant

    public class Literal<T>
extends FormulaImpl<T>
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Class Literal provides the leafs of the formula tree. Either a single proposition or a negated single proposition.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class modalLogic.formula.FormulaImpl

        negation, type

      • Fields inherited from class modalLogic.formula.Formula
